DOC.brief_summary: Pilot study determine whether daily consumption blackraspberry powder ( high polyphenols ) reduce marker inflammation determine whether genetics influence baseline level inflammatory marker well individual 's response polyphenols . A total 10 male participate cross-over study .
DOC.detailed_description: A high-fat , high-calorie challenge meal administer induce inflammatory response overweight obese adult male . Serum level CRP , TNF-alpha , IL-6 measure prior challenge meal various time ( 1,2,4,8 , 12 hour ) challenge meal . The challenge meal give without intervention 5 daily dos concentrate black-raspberry powder mixed water .
DOC.criteria: adult male 55 year age overweight obese history adverse reaction berry berry product history adverse reaction highfat , highcalorie challenge meal significant liver renal insufficiency significant cognitive impairment
